photo.description: Killian O'Daly sports the 25 Year celebratory achademy kit.
James Crotty, Tadhg Connellan and Killian O'Daly as part of the Academy U9 team. Can you pick them out?

Tadhg Connellan, Darren Meehan, James Crotty, Mikey Whelan, Tomas Hehir and Killian O'Daly are still playing with the culb. This is them as part of the U10 Academy team that participated in the Barnados tournament in Cork.
Tomas Hehir hands over the Avenue United Pennent to xxx of Cork in the Bernardos U10 tournament.
Tomas Hehir hands over the Avenue United Pennent to Killarney Celtic in the Bernardos U10 tournament.

Killian O'Daly, Kieran Mahony, James Crotty, Paddy Honan, Mark 'Sparky' , and Eoghan Tynne at the Tulla U16 tournament. The Avenue lads played twice in this tournament, both times a year younger than the opposition and reached the final on both occasions.
2016 Clare Youths team. Can you spot Kingsley, Killian, Ikem, and Pa (Captain)??
